name: Hog Wild (itch)
description:
Herd the pigs into their pens, but make sure they don't fall into the black holes. Be vigilant, because even if a pig is in a pen, it may wander out! Your final score is however many pigs you have herded into their pens before the time limit.

This was made for the GMTK Jam 2020 in 48 hours. I'll be honest, I did this more as a fun exercise, but I learned a lot and I'm glad I did it. Obviously I wish I had spent more time polishing and adding features, but I guess that's why it's a game jam.
